body:
After seeing a fan fiction story, i decided to write my own.  

So it begins: 
Prologue 
Two men peered over a table. "Our plans are complete, and our troops ready for attack" said the first.  "good" said the second, "initiate the attack. O and, what about the, the other plans?". "Soon they too will be complete, and we will win the war as it starts, replied the first." "good" said the second man again. 
Chapter 1
Every body new of the attack when it came. And it came from everywhere. On the second day of the war Ivy called a special meeting of the senate. 

This will hopefully be updated every day.
